headline.main: U.S. Congressman Who Posed With Gun in Office Could Face Probe
headline.print_headline: U.S. Congressman Who Posed With Gun in Office Could Face Probe

docs.snippet: A Republican member of Congress who posed for a photo with an assault rifle in his office could face investigation for violating the District of Columbia’s gun laws, the city's attorney general’s office said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Republican member of Congress who posed for a photo with an assault rifle in his office could face investigation for violating the District of Columbia’s gun laws, the city's attorney general’s office said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Colts Quarterback Gathers Support for Child Health Program
headline.print_headline: Colts Quarterback Gathers Support for Child Health Program

docs.snippet: Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck threw and caught a pass Tuesday during a visit to the Indiana Statehouse during which he promoted a health and fitness initiative for children....
docs.lead_paragraph: Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck threw and caught a pass Tuesday during a visit to the Indiana Statehouse during which he promoted a health and fitness initiative for children.

headline.main: Baby Sitter Pleads Guilty in Death of Girl, 4, Left at Home
headline.print_headline: Baby Sitter Pleads Guilty in Death of Girl, 4, Left at Home

docs.snippet: A New Jersey baby sitter has pleaded guilty to child endangerment charges stemming from the death of a 4-year-old girl who became trapped in a futon when left at home last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New Jersey baby sitter has pleaded guilty to child endangerment charges stemming from the death of a 4-year-old girl who became trapped in a futon when left at home last year.

headline.main: Broadcom Profit Beats as Demand Rises From Smartphone Makers
headline.print_headline: Broadcom Profit Beats as Demand Rises From Smartphone Makers

docs.snippet: Wireless chip maker Broadcom Inc reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, helped by strong sales of its WiFi and broadband chips to smartphone makers such as Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics Co Ltd....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wireless chip maker Broadcom Inc reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, helped by strong sales of its WiFi and broadband chips to smartphone makers such as Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics Co Ltd.

headline.main: Prosecutors blame captain for fatal migrant shipwreck
headline.sub: Prosecutors blame captain for fatal migrant shipwreck

docs.snippet: Italian authorities are holding two men on suspicion of smuggling migrants to their deaths in the weekend shipwreck that has shocked Europe. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian authorities are holding two men on suspicion of smuggling migrants to their deaths in the weekend shipwreck that has shocked Europe. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: Virginia County Settles Police Shooting Lawsuit for $3M
headline.print_headline: Virginia County Settles Police Shooting Lawsuit for $3M

docs.snippet: A Virginia county has agreed to pay nearly $3 million to settle a wrongful death lawsuit after one of its police officers shot and killed a man in the doorway of his home two years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Virginia county has agreed to pay nearly $3 million to settle a wrongful death lawsuit after one of its police officers shot and killed a man in the doorway of his home two years ago.

headline.main: Yahoo's Profit, Revenue Miss Street Forecasts as Costs Rise
headline.print_headline: Yahoo's Profit, Revenue Miss Street Forecasts as Costs Rise

docs.snippet: Yahoo Inc missed Wall Street's revenue and profit forecasts as slight growth in its online advertising businesses was outweighed by higher payments to partners and websites which send readers to Yahoo....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yahoo Inc missed Wall Street's revenue and profit forecasts as slight growth in its online advertising businesses was outweighed by higher payments to partners and websites which send readers to Yahoo.

headline.main: Betty Willis, Designer Who Left Mark on Vegas With Famous Sign, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Betty Willis, Designer Who Left Mark on Vegas With Famous Sign, Dies at 91

docs.snippet: Betty Willis, an artist who designed a popular welcome sign on the Las Vegas strip and created a number of other famous neon signs in the tourist haven, has died at age 91, a mortuary said on its website....
docs.lead_paragraph: Betty Willis, an artist who designed a popular welcome sign on the Las Vegas strip and created a number of other famous neon signs in the tourist haven, has died at age 91, a mortuary said on its website.

headline.main: Hubble Space Telescope Marking 25th Anniversary in Orbit
headline.print_headline: Hubble Space Telescope Marking 25th Anniversary in Orbit

docs.snippet: One of NASA's crowning glories, the Hubble Space Telescope, marks its 25th anniversary this week....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of NASA's crowning glories, the Hubble Space Telescope, marks its 25th anniversary this week.

docs.snippet: Kevin Harvick, winner of the 2014 Nascar Sprint Cup, was honored at the White House....
